Addie in the portrait pose is available with a Sovereign 350 reverse

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10129/joss-portrait[/IMG]

Will ship in an uncracked BVG 2 holder for $113 shipping included.

A very presentable HOF card on a partly cloudy day.;):eek:
